DOC.detailed_description: Seven healthy child participate study . The child participate outpatient basis study day carry Physiological Research Unit Hospital Sick Children , Toronto , Canada . Inclusion criterion include : healthy , take medication , recent weight change , history significant illness , willing participate study . Exclusion criterion presence illness , significant weight change , acceptance diet . Prior enrolment , subject fill 3 day food record form ensure normal dietary behavior . The study explain subject parents/guardians , benefit potential risk explain well write assent , child , consent parent obtain . Subjects receive financial compensation . Each subject receive compensation participation . Each parent/guardian reimburse transpiration/parking expense meal study day .
